summary: A tall Nord archer follower, who can be found in Riverwood, the Sleeping Giant Inn.
descriptionHtml:
A tall Nord archer follower, who can be found in Riverwood, the Sleeping Giant Inn. (If he isn't there the first time you enter just reload & he will be there.) His stats are buffed & his weapons are daedric, so he should be a great follower. He also has perks that can help a sneak player.
Requirements:
1. Apachii Sky Hair Male v1
2. Cute Eyes
3. Faces Younger  Geonox Faces without Beards

If you wish to use my mod anywhere else feel free to do so, but please let me know.
author: SnowQueen
